short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyboard shortcuts to html5 video media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turbo charges your HTML5 videos by adding keyboard shortcuts to fast forward, rewind, and increase/decrease speed.

Default keyboard shortcuts:
] = fast forward 5 seconds
[ = rewind 5 seconds
} = increase speed by 25%
{ = decrease speed by 25%

You may set you own keyboard shortcuts in the Options page.

Notes: In some cases, it is required to bring the video into focus by clicking on it, so that the shortcuts work.
